paper_abstract: Valiant's theory of holographic algorithms is a novel methodology to achieve exponential speed-ups in computation. A fundamental parameter in holographic algorithms is the dimension of the linear basis vectors. We completely resolve the problem of the power of higher dimensional bases. We prove that 2-dimensional bases are universal for holographic algorithms. (c) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Holographic algorithms: The power of dimensionality resolved
